name: Savoury Pizza Waffles
description: Looking for a delicious twist on pizza night or breakfast? Try gluten-free waffles as a savoury base to pile on your favourite toppings—all those pillowy pockets are perfect for trapping herby marinara sauce.
preparation: In a bowl, whisk together waffle mix, sauce mix, milk, yogurt, oil, and egg.
Meanwhile, prepare toppings. Thinly slice pepper. Cut cherry tomatoes in halves.
When waffles are done, carefully place onto Sheet Pan. Top each with 1⁄4 cup sauce; add pepper and tomatoes; cover with cheese. Bake in preheated 425° F oven until cheese melts, about 2–3 min.
To serve, place waffles on plates; top with spinach.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄4 cup of your favourite Epicure Dip (tip: make with 2% Greek yogurt to boost protein) and 1 cup sliced veggies for dipping.
